serp.content: This paper investigates the feasibility of Hiccup, a teenage boy, being able to supply enough fish to maintain the dragon's diet by catching and ...

serp.title: Can Hiccup Supply Enough Fish to Maintain a Dragon's Diet?
serp.content: Hiccup would have had to carry 828 fish weighing at total of 8592 kg over the twelve days, which is unrealistic since he struggles to lift a shield in combat.
